1.1.name: wordpress/entrepreneurship-1
1.1.description:
(Description in Swedish in the bottom) Most people do not blog for money. Its the social aspect of internet that appeals to the blogger. But, every blogger wants their audience to share their content and thoughts. However, most reader of blogs do not think of this when reading. You have to tell your readers to share! Conversion experts use the word "Call to action"

With Entrepreneurship +1 you can ad a unique call to action to every post and article on your blog, easily! By this making certain, more readers share your blogposts

Also: * Its easy to change color of your the plugin to fit your blog or to increase focus on the sharing section of each post. * Choose between several sharing buttons depending on what social network you targeting. * Adapt shared messages for each social network * Change settings easily, for each social network. Example: Write the text of the tweet. * Buttons for special Swedish Social Networks

The Entrepreneurship +1 is intended for
